'''Blizzard Blade Seki no To''' is [[Kamisato Ayaka]]'s [[Level 2 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|icd|Extra Cutting DMG}}
** This ICD is shared with the Cutting DMG of the main Frostflake Seki no To.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Extra Bloom DMG|0}}

==Trivia==
* "Seki no To" {{Lang|ja=関の扉}} can mean "barrier gate" and is also the name of a Japanese song associated with kabuki.<ref>Japanese Wikipedia: [https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/積恋雪関扉 積恋雪関扉]|note=the song is abbreviated as 関の扉 or Seki no To</ref>
